ProductInfo.Features:
Image Sensor: CMOS. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV Lines. Signal System: NTSC standard
IR LEDs: Built-in 36 LEDs IR Illuminators. Minimum Illumination: 0.0 lux
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Lens: Built-in 6mm Lens. Built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Advanced day night mode: outputs color images on good light conditions and switches to black & white images on low light conditions
Metal body housing, mount and sun shade. Aluminum housing for indoor outdoor application
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Bullet Security Camera Outdoor Infrared Day Night Vision 520TVL with IR Cut Filter Switch Color Video Home CCTV Surveillance D02
